translations: vi.闲谈；<美>泄露秘密（tattle 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: And much to her chagrin, I have tattled to every single person we've met since.
sentences.translation: 而且我和见到的每个人都闲谈了会，这让她更恼火了。

sentences.sentence: When I dumped him a few weeks later, I thought he was going to hate me for life. He tattled on me to the teacher each chance he got, making me cry and look like a baby in gym class.
sentences.translation: 果然不出我所料，从那以后，只要抓住机会他就会向老师告状，弄得我痛哭流涕，活像一个不愿上体操课的小孩。
